subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: South Florida used an 18-2 run that stretched from the first half through the second to take control of the game and advanced to the Round of 32 for the first time in school history.
snippet: South Florida used an 18-2 run that stretched from the first half through the second to take control of the game and advanced to the Round of 32 for the first time in school history.
